content:
Sure, here's a more inviting version:

"Hi [Client Name], this is Denis from Equitable. I hope you're having a great day so far. I wanted to reach out and let you know that it's time for your annual financial review. This review is a great opportunity for us to ensure that your 403(b) retirement account is on track to meet your financial goals.

During our review, we'll discuss any changes to your financial situation or goals, review your account performance, and determine if any adjustments need to be made to your retirement plan. Plus, we'll catch up on how things have been going since we last spoke!

I understand that your time is valuable, but I truly believe that this review will be worth your while. So, let's find a time that works best for you. When would you be available for your annual financial review?"
